item.title: Building Static Sites with Next.js
item.description: title: "Building Static Sites with Next.js — Summary" slug: "2025-09-30-static-sites-with-nextjs" date: 2025-09-30 kind: "summary" Shipping Next.js as a static site is about a predictable build plus the right deployment wiring. Enable output: 'export', set a base path when serving from a project subdirectory, and use GitHub Actions to export and publish the out/ folder so assets resolve cleanly on GitHub Pages or any CDN.
